attributes.title: IT TURNED ME ORANGE!!!

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD!!
attributes.review: As soon as i opened the app trumps face popped up, locked eyes with my cat and possessed him. Then MY CAT STARTED TALKING. He told me he was spreading the message for trump and started yelling racial slurs and nonsense about white power. I would never recommend this app for the safety of your beloved pets and family.

attributes.title: If I could rate it .5 I would
attributes.review: It has way too many glitches and as soon as I downloaded my phone starting overheating from all of the notifications. Do not download this app!!

attributes.title: dont trust him!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our beautiful and amazing president but when I got it all of a sudden I was downloading this thing and I got a computer virus. THEN MY PANTS SLIPPED OFF!! My mom tried to come in but i told her i deleted the virus!! This is crazy I cant support trump!! DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!

attributes.title: don‚Äôt download.

attributes.title: TRUMP
attributes.review: Donald Trump has never been an elected official. He has never held elected office of any kind. He‚Äôs never had to broker political compromise, give political speeches or pour over political briefing notes. So why on earth, with no experience in politics, would people think he‚Äôd make a good president?
